original_title: Cold Snap: Imaging The Universe's Coldest Temperatures
overview: Join a team of scientists as they venture into the coldest system in the universe - a dilution refrigerator. For the first time ever, using a state-of-the-art neutron camera, they snap a glimpse of the mysterious physics behind its operation. Discover the secrets of the universe's coldest system in this exciting new documentary, with a little help from some minifigure friendsâ€¦
title: Cold Snap: Imaging The Universe's Coldest Temperatures
